website_summaries.verdict: Durable polyester materials for a personalized dog collar, meaning it should last.
pros: Nickel-plated buckle and D-ring resist corrosion
Uses a clasp to lock the adjustable size in place
Plenty of customized options, with 20 different collar and letter color choices
May use up to 24 characters and symbols on the collar

customer_reviews.title: Cheap metal clasp
customer_reviews.text: The clasp on these collars are made of some kind of metal and they quickly disintegrate and crumble and no longer work.
customer_reviews.author: smathews in MD

customer_reviews.title: Clasp Stains Fur
customer_reviews.text: Ordered three collars late May of this year. Originally we were pleasantly surprised at the apparent quality of these collars including the clasp, but... Update 9/24/18. The metal clasp has stained all three of my dogs white chests. What is this fine powder, nickel? This cannot be good for them. The staining does not wear off, but is cummulative and only comes off with bathing. The other aspects of the collars a quite nice, but due to this staining I've replaced them with plastic clasp collars (as much as I hate plastic, at least no staining). Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Iris Island

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality!
customer_reviews.text: I am highly dissapointed with this collar. For starters when personalizing the collar there was no preview to how it looked. I did not realize that the microchipped symbol also said microchipped so I put the words on the collar as well. Had I of known then I wouldnt have wasted that space and would have pkaced my phine number instead. 2. The collar itself I do not feel will last long for a dog that is playful and going to be in and outside and rolling around. It is SO thin and cheap. The metal clasp is very cheap. I am extremely dissapointed especially for the price of this collar!!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Boseman

customer_reviews.title: Adorable! Perfect for Agility!!
customer_reviews.text: For Agility, the dog is not permitted to wear a harness or a collar with tags on it. I still want her to be safe for that "just in case." So I found these customizable collars and I was so excited! I think it turned out beautifully. My dog is an 11lb dog and I ordered the small. The only thing I hope will soften with time is where the material meets, right now it is stiff which causes the collar to bend. I can't tell how the metal will stand up to use, I only received it today. But so far, I'm super happy!!
customer_reviews.author: WeAreDogPeople

customer_reviews.title: Great Collars!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't expect much out of these collars, but they seem to be wearing well! The fabric is similar to seatbelt material, and seems to be pretty strong yet soft at the same time. The buckle is also pretty decent for the price. The ONLY issue I have experienced is the buckle coming loose when the dogs get to roughhousing. Doesn't happen very often, but it has happened once or twice! Definitely worth the money, however.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Saved my dog
customer_reviews.text: I bought these collars for 5 of my 10 dogs. The quality is very good. The embroidery doesn't unravel as some others do. The clasp is plastic and a metal one would be better because one of my dogs bites on the others collars and sometimes chews them off. But the plastic clips are good quality, they don't break. One of my dogs got away from us a couple times and both times the name and number on her collar allowed someone to call us. I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Just got these yesterday and I am impressed. The metal clasp, which is why I bought these, is heavy duty. No way my dogs can undo these for each other like they did with the plastic clip collars. I bought the XL with the XL font. My yellow lab looks gorgeous with the brown collar and light blue writing, and my brown akita looks so handsome in his light blue collar with brown writing. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: puppitypup

customer_reviews.title: Place your order very carefully
customer_reviews.text: Bought the collars for my 2 standard poodles. I like the quality and the ease in reading the information on the collar, as well as the color options. The only issue I have is that once you enter the personalized information, you have no way to confirm the information is correct before placing the order. Unfortunately, the phone number on Jasper's collar was one digit off. So - I'll order another collar for him because there's no sense in having the collar if the phone number on it is incorrect. So just be very careful.
customer_reviews.author: kc

customer_reviews.title: Excellent collars!
customer_reviews.text: These dog collars are great. Vibrant colors with clear lettering, spaced out in several spots on the collar so that name and number are visible however the collar is adjusted. They arrived quickly and fit my dogs well. I also like that the xsmall size of this collar is as wide as the small size, making the text easier to read on my smaller dog than comparable brands. Overall, very satisfied with my purchase! Edited to add: I got the xsmall for my mini dachshund who weighs approx 10lbs, and the small for my standard dachshund who is around 18lbs. I measured the dogs prior to ordering.
customer_reviews.author: txjd09

customer_reviews.title: Collar came off when my dog was just sitting next to me. Can't use it to walk her.
customer_reviews.text: Really like the look of this collar. Name nicely printed on it. Good colors. I purchased this collar specifically for the metal clasp, thinking it was sturdier then plastic. When my dog was just relaxing next to me the collar fell off. I can't trust this collar to walk her, so I'm using a different one right now. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Trista Jonk

customer_reviews.title: Love this collar
customer_reviews.text: Love this collar! Collar originally received had the wrong logo (footballs instead of baseball) and the seller was quick to correct it and send a replacement. This is a high quality color with all metal fixtures so I think it should last a long time. If I had to do it again i probably would have picked a darker color for the main color as it does get dirty over time but it cleans super easy with soap and water and if I wash it at night it's dry by morning to put back on. I'm very pleased with the product and would recommend to others looking for a great personalized collar at a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney R.

customer_reviews.title: Good collar with fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: I got the personalized collar for our new puppy, with her name and my phone number so that hopefully if she ever gets lost, someone will find her and call. I was amazed with how quickly they were able to personalize the collar and have it delivered. We wanted a metal clasp because we have had situations where the plastic clasps on other collars has broken. The material isn't the thickest I've seen, we have a 90 pound Bluetick Coonhound and her collar has metal clasps and this thick vinyl, but it is more than enough for our 40 pound puppy right now.
customer_reviews.author: Da Burgh

customer_reviews.title: I bought two a few months apart... they are not the same.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two a few months apart... they are not the same. Everything is identical except line 1 & line 2 are on one line on the first collar, line 1 & line 2 are on top of each other on the second collar. It's frustrating because I wanted my dogs to have matching collars. The newest collar's font isn't as big as the first collar. I was very happy with the first collar, the second one not so much. Overall the product is sturdy and nice, just sad about the inconsistency.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Belle Conway

customer_reviews.title: Large one is heavier than other more popular ones on AMZ.
customer_reviews.text: Have had problems with plastic closures not fully catching and buckle type coming open while swimming ( and lost all tags ). This collar looks very nicely made with metal closure and a secondary loop to keep the overlap ( from adjusting size ) flat. The only thing I didn’t realize was that was his name is full height, the rest is half the size so they “stack” them. While not a problem, would be good to choose colors carefully for max contrast
customer_reviews.author: 9 yards

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality. Strong Collar
customer_reviews.text: I love the metal buckle on this collar. Too often the plastic ones break, so that was a main priority for me. This collar came super fast for being a personalized item. It is strong and I believe will be very durable throughout the lifetime of my dog. The personalization is woven right into the collar not something cheaply stamped on that will fade over time. It is definitely permanently in place. Very nice collar. I ordered this in a small for a puppy but I will definitely be ordering another one in the larger size as she grows.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality collar and nice metal clasp which seems way ...
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed, Order was shipped the day I ordered and arrived 2 days earlier than scheduled. Good quality collar and nice metal clasp which seems way more secure than a plastic one. My dog was so excited to have a new collar that he brought us his leash so we could take him for a walk! Definitely would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Great collar. Metal components and easy to read.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these collars for our pug, and my wife and I are very happy with it. The collar appears to be built well; in particular I am happy with the quality of the clasp. This is not just a cheap plastic collar, the clasp and other components are all metal. Also, the lettering is large, clean and easy to read (I went with purple text on pink background for our little girl). I have not had this collar more than a few days, but I expect it to last a long time. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Komorek

customer_reviews.title: Good overall.
customer_reviews.text: This is good quality overall. I think the enclosure on the collar we received must be defective since it keeps coming undone. The reason we purchased is because our dog goes on a walk about and if someone finds him, I wanted an easily readable collar. Our dog is microchipped, but people don’t go through the trouble to take a dog to the vet to have them scanned. The collar was my back up plan. So if the enclosure worked better, this would be great. I’ll order another one and give it a second chance.
customer_reviews.author: A. Marie Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Awesome  Collar
customer_reviews.text: I just received this collar and it’s awesome. It’s very well made and has a metal clasp instead of plastic. The thing I like the most and why I bought it is the clear and bold printing. You can clearly read my dogs name and my phone number because it’s printed several times all the way around the collar. If the worst ever happens and our little guy gets lost anyone who finds him will easily be able to read my phone number. He is chipped but this collar will get him back much faster if we ever lose him. It’s a bit pricey but well worth the peace of mind it provides. GREAT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: 1HonestMan

customer_reviews.title: Noisy and cheap fittings
customer_reviews.text: I bought this collar so my dog didn't need an ID tag that jangled. I find the jangling annoying and they hear better than I do so I can't imagine what it's like for them to have jangling tags. The metal clasp is heavy and well, it jangles... There is a metal keeper on the collar as well that just seems cheap. I though about getting the plastic clasp version but was advised against it because the clasps are weak, or so I was told. Overall I love the idea but poor execution on the clasps. Get a hold of me when you find quality clasps.
customer_reviews.author: Feathery

customer_reviews.title: Metal Clasp is Overwhelming the best feature
customer_reviews.text: I have bought numerous collars from Hot Dog. I have hunting dogs and want a collar that won't come off, has my info in case the dog gets lost. This is the collar. You can customize the color combination. The metal clasp is the biggest feature of mine. My dogs are hard working and running through brush etc. I want a buckle that will not break as I rely on the collar to be there in case the dog gets lost.
customer_reviews.author: Ncharg

customer_reviews.title: Be sure it clicks or you'll be chasing your dog!
customer_reviews.text: First, for safety reasons, I want to tell everyone to be sure to click the buckle together all the way. My dog walker and husband (on separate occasions) have failed to completely close the collar and my dog has broken free, which luckily did not have disastrous consequences. That being said, delivery of the collar was fast and I have no complaints about the colors or printing. (It is very readable from a distance, so women may want to be careful about advertising their private phone number in this way if you frequent parks, etc. with a lot of strangers around.)
customer_reviews.author: A. Ski

customer_reviews.title: Attractive collar provides some peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: My daughter-in-law recommended this collar for my new rescue dog. Having Susie's name and phone number on the collar gives me some peace of mind in case she accidentally gets out without me. (She is also microchipped.) I like the selection of colors offered. It is very attractive, and matches her lead. The bright color looks great on her brindle coat. As Susie grows, it will be easy to adjust. I especially like the strong metal closure.I consider this to be a good value and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: Buy!  Buy!  Buy!  You will love this.
customer_reviews.text: This is, hands down, the BEST dog collar I've ever put on a dog. I've had dogs my whole life, lots of collars. This is the BEST. All the message is readable, not so easy on a small collar. The collar adjusts like a breeze. The easy snap metal connector allows for easy removal of the collar. Looks great, too! Even supporting American business...does it get better than this? Buy! Buy! Buy!
customer_reviews.author: m rice

customer_reviews.title: Don't give them your phone number.
customer_reviews.text: Collar came as expected, but the sizing is a bit off. I measured my dog at around 14", but the medium didn't go small enough. Also have received a lot more spam calls since giving this company my phone number, I suspect they outsource the actual production and that company is either compromised or selling phone numbers.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Pros and cons
customer_reviews.text: Liked that it was narrow and flexible. And, that they put the name in large print and number in small print. Didn’t like that the inside has a really rough area where the buckle is attached. I had to duct tape the area to take away the sharp points. Also, my fault not theirs, dark blue on black isn’t visible. The reflective light of the photo makes it much more visible than in normal light.
customer_reviews.author: its me

customer_reviews.title: Durable and printing on collar a smart idea
customer_reviews.text: This is a durable and heavy duty collar. I like that it has a metal clip buckle instead of a plastic one. I had a plastic one that broke, not good. It also has a metal D-ring to hook a leash to. It has the name and phone number printed on it which is so nice because I've had dog tags that have also pulled off. I put my husband's name and cell phone number on the collar instead of our dog's name. I thought that would be more important than my dog's name in locating us. So important in getting your dog back home.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie My Lady

customer_reviews.title: Love our dog collars
customer_reviews.text: This is the second purchase I have made as we have added a second dog to our family. I like having our dogs names and contact information on the collar. The i.d. tags can sometimes fall off with rough play so I have our dogs double covered. During my second purchase I forgot to add a piece of information. I emailed them and they gladly remade the collar after shipping the first. Their customer service is top notch. I can't recommend them enough.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Very nice long-lasting product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in medium and the 3/4 inch width. I chose the green typing over black and it is nice and easy to read without being to bright. The information is made into the collar and isnt embroidered onto it so it seems like it will last a very long time. I like that the collar doesn't have to be 1 inch thick because that width is too thick for my dogs neck. Very nice product. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Kellbell45

customer_reviews.title: Nicer than expected!
customer_reviews.text: i have a French/English Bulldog mix. He has a thick neck but stout. In other words you can’t really go with a wide collar on him. The medium width is perfect! Thanks for making it as those are hard to find. The collar is pretty cool. Good colors. Very bright and even though the name and phone number is imprinted all around the collar it’s not a bad thing! No tag needed for sure. I will be buying more. I feel more secure that heaven forbid he’s lost someone will see his name and my phone number. (And that he’s chipped!)
customer_reviews.author: Marjie

customer_reviews.title: Well made and easy to read.
customer_reviews.text: Our furry boys like to escape, occasionally, and these dog collars with our name and phone number on them are perfect! High quality materials, metal clasps and large print that stay cleaner than embroidered collars. Our boys are outdoor, large dogs, walk on a leash a few times a week, roll around in the dirt, outside baths a few times a month - the collars stay on and hold up well!
customer_reviews.author: Liana M. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Durable, comfortable, legible—great collar, good value
customer_reviews.text: I ordered collars for both of my dogs and they are great. The fabric is very sturdy but still comfortable. The all-metal clasp is really durable and easier to unclasp than those stupid plastic buckles. The personalization is large and legible, and it’s woven into the fabric so it won’t wear off. I would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Yocona

customer_reviews.title: it has metal buckle
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize that it had a metal buckle and it's heavy for my little dog, and it comes apart so easily that I am afraid that it will come apart. The color was darker than expected and did not match the harness that I had so I don't use it. I do like the phone number being on the collar.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Nic

customer_reviews.title: Well made!
customer_reviews.text: Love these colors, I've never kept collars on my dogs unless we were going out of the house but with a new home and new area I didnt want to risk them getting away. Their old collars drove them nuts but they havent had the need to scratch or try to move these. This is the medium narrow, my dogs are between 60 and 65 lbs each. Well made collars!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah A.

customer_reviews.title: false advertisement
customer_reviews.text: Description says metal clasp and they sent me a plastic one thats false advertisement I called Amazon and got my money back I trashed the collar
customer_reviews.author: chris jones

customer_reviews.title: Not a metal clasp
customer_reviews.text: It is not a metal clasp. It is a cheap plastic clasp painted with chrome-colored paint. And since it is personalized it cannot be returned. I would not attach a leash to it and count on it holding a dog that pulls.
customer_reviews.author: An Amazon Fan

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: After finding a terrified dog during a thunderstorm with an engraved collar and contacting the owner in 5 minutes, I knew I wanted the same style collar for my dog. This collar looks sharp and of great quality. Whenever I bring my dog to the dog park I always get asked where I got it. I have the reassurance that if he ran off, someone (hopefully) would call me so he could get back home quickly. I plan on ordering a few more as Christmas gifts for my family's pets.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and good alternative to tags!
customer_reviews.text: One of my dogs has been tearing through the rings that held her tags on, losing the tags in the yard. I decided to try this collar as an alternative. It was shipped out the same day I ordered which I didn’t expect and was delivered a couple days later. The quality itself is great and arrived just as I ordered it. She loves her pretty new necklace and I will be ordering them for my other two dogs as well.
customer_reviews.author: Rushell

customer_reviews.title: Good looking , high quality dog collar
customer_reviews.text: The dog collar is extremely well made. Colors are bold and letters and numbers are easy to read. Gave this to my dog nephew for Easter. My sister says it’s a great collar and Frankie likes it as well as any other collar! Having Frankie’s name and phone number on the collar is reassuring. Thanks for producing a great product
customer_reviews.author: betsy

customer_reviews.title: Quality personalized xs collars arrived quickly
customer_reviews.text: We purchased xs collars for our pair of Maltese. The collars arrived ahead of schedule. We are pleased with the accuracy of the color & design depicted in the listing. Hedwig & Wheatley find them to be comfortable without sharp or scratchy edges. We appreciate the quality of the fabric, personalization, & fittings.
customer_reviews.author: Donnita

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST!
customer_reviews.text: As pictured here, this collar is vibrant in color, fits perfectly and looks great! This is our 2nd purchase for this type collar. We can attest to its durability! We also have two GSD dogs who rough n tumble one another, often pulling on their collars. There has been no sign of fraying, fading or the lettering coming off. To some, it may be a bit pricy, but in our estimation well worth it! We will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: NanB

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Durable and Easy to Read
customer_reviews.text: This collar has metal clasps and is made with a sturdy material. I was worried i would have to adjust the collar too much and the information would no longer be visible. That is not the case as the pups name and phone number are repeated on the entire collar so it will not be overlooked. I am very happy with this purchase and will recommend it to all of my pet loving friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: ac

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my two dogs and have loved them so much we actually bought two more for my moms dogs. They are Rottweilers who typically chew through any plastic collar clips, but we are several months in with these metal clips and they have not chew through them! They are very cute, and easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Works for my big cat
customer_reviews.text: I actually use this for my 20 lb cat. He needed something a little more hefty than your typical cat collar. He goes outside on a lead and needed a collar that was comfortable and strong. This collar delivers. He doesn't get it off. It is bright for easy spotting should he manage to get out without his lead on, and the collar is wide enough that it doesn't get lost in his fur.
customer_reviews.author: Addicted2Prime

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, readable, and well-made
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING COLLAR!!! It looks great and is very sturdy for our 70 pound puppy retriever!! Loved how personal the package felt with treats for the pups, I also love that it had the option to add a chipped icon so that people know! Extremely readable and the metal clasp and loop are very sturdy.Very happy :) Definitely will be buying again when he grows again. PS for anyone wondering about size, Medium fit our big golden great!!
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Omg! I just received the collar today and it is beyond expectations especially for the price! It looks very nice and it has a metal clasp which holds up better than plastic. I ordered this with Prime and it arrived in just a couple days. I will order more because my dachshund is always rolled in smelly stuff and I want to always have a clean one.
customer_reviews.author: batfum

customer_reviews.title: Worth 10 STARS!!
customer_reviews.text: Seems durable and looks stylish! Can’t beat this for made in USA! Customized exactly as I selected. Beware some collars are only for look and can’t be used to walk your 80lb dog. This collar is made to be used every day!! Can safety tie the leash and walk the beast! Highly recommend and will be making other purchases with the discount code they send as a thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: VS2

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and clear text !
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful collar! We purchased the narrow medium and it fits great. Our dog is right around 50 lbs. I blurred out some of my phone number in the photo for security purposes but you can see how clear the rest of the text is. I feel better knowing that if she gets out of the house and is found somewhere that the rescuer can see the number clearly and contact me right away!
customer_reviews.author: Christy Gust

customer_reviews.title: Great Collar - good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice collar - great solid metal clip not plastic! It makes me feel so much better that my baby has a collar with her name and it gives my number and lets people know she has a chip. I should have ordered the next size down so I did not have to size it down so much but that is my fault not theirs.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a great product.
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased my second collar for my dog who runs as if she isn’t loved all day long. Needless to say we’re lucky enough to have pet friendly neighbors who call us when she stops to get pet - all thanks to these great collars. Well made and a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Impressive durability
customer_reviews.text: The day after I got these my puppies somehow got one off and chewed almost completely thru it. I would say at least half way. They're now 2 70lb german shephards and they rough house daily and this half eaten collar has not ripped anymore then when they initially started eating it. I'm super impressed with how durable it has been.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie1345

customer_reviews.title: Well made collar
customer_reviews.text: For a custom product, this item arrived very quickly. I bought it because the name tag on our dog's collar fell off. I like the idea that this information is actually on the collar. I am very pleased with the quality. Bought the large and it is very generous. It has plenty of room for our Great Pyr to grow into it. I will probably be replacing our other 2 dog's collars with one of these.
customer_reviews.author: S. Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Last a long time!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd time purchasing these collars our dogs outgrown the last ones and we ordered the large. Large fits both our dogs a 102lbs German Shepherd and a 120lbs Rottweiler. Very durable! Great value for the money and LOVE the bright bold colors!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa B.

customer_reviews.title: These collars are the best!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd collar for my 3rd dog. Flash's collar just came today and it looks great! I included a picture of my German Shepherd. You can see above his harness he is still wearing his personalized collar a year later. Of note, I just got his harness this week so that'd almost a year of 100 pound dog yanking on that collar when we go out. So proof these collars look beautiful and hold up incredibly well. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Sublett

customer_reviews.title: Quality Collar
customer_reviews.text: QUALITY!!! Looks GREAT! A little bit bulkier than I expected but I dig it. Big metal clip makes it very easy to put on and off and looks heavy and expensive. I tried to order a similar cat collar from another supplier and it seemed cheap and cheesy in comparison. Might even try adjusting to its smallest size and getting another for our cat... hmmmm 0 now there;s an idea!
customer_reviews.author: A. H. C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: This is the second order for this product. I dont use as primary leash collar and cannot say if it would be durable against a puller, but it is just what I needed for ID. Our dogs lose there tags constantly so this solved the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL COLLAR!
customer_reviews.text: There was nothing to dislike it is a wonderful color sets nice colors are beautiful very durable and my dogs don’t mind wearing them at all and there’s nothing hanging down to bang against their food dish. Great collar good prices!
customer_reviews.author: rollerskatingmomma

customer_reviews.title: not good for small dogs
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in this collar. I ordered an x-small and the build quality is nice but the metal slide hardware is not the right size for the material and cannot accommodate the thickness of the loop. As a result, the collar will not lay flat and you end up with a large bulge as depicted in my photo. Maybe this is not an issue with the larger collars but it can’t be comfortable for a 7lb dog and looks awkward on her so I won’t be using it. Shame that it’s a personalized item or I would return it.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey C. Speicher

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my Boston Terrorist for around the house! He plays hard and ID tags always get ripped off, and we hated that dogtag sound. We’ll still use a harness for big walks and tie-outs, but at least we have this on him whenever he sneaks out the door!
customer_reviews.author: Kennyhennessy

customer_reviews.title: Best collar ever!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best dog collar on the market!! It looks great, fits great, well made, and durable!! The metal clasp is perfect! No more plastic clasps that break or wear out! The name on the collar stands out and can be read easily. It was made and shipped within two days of ordering! So even though it’s a personalized item, it arrived super fast with Prime. The color choices and symbols were great. Definitely the best choice!!
customer_reviews.author: Psychogiggle

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Fantastic price for a customized collar!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this collar. Much more durable and well made than I had anticipated. My lab, who is EXTREMELY energetic, and loves to pull on her leash, has not in any way caused damage to this collar, which I had expected to have happen by now. I will definitely be buying more for my other dogs as well
customer_reviews.author: G. Craig

customer_reviews.title: Olivia's first collar
customer_reviews.text: My rescued Frenchie loves her new collar. She seems proud when I put it on her. I love the metal clasp, easy to put on and take off. It gives me a feeling of security that her name and phone number are on it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Davenport

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: 6 months later my dog still wears this! I get compliments all the time on it. I love that all the people at the park know his name. The writing is big enough that I feel comfortable if he was ever to run away someone would be able to read my phone number and get him home to me.
customer_reviews.author: HAE

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The collar is perfect! The colors are bright and the lettering is large and readable. The clasp seems strong and believe me, my Finn will put it to the test. Once the size was adjusted to where she needed it it hasn’t slipped or enlarged at all. You won’t be disappointed in this one.
customer_reviews.author: Anne H

customer_reviews.title: Great collar with a great price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just received these collars today (a day early) and I must say that these collars are awesome! I love the size (large) which fits my 3 year old pit perfectly and still has room to expand if needed. My 4 month old pit Zeus is growing so I got him the large since I anticipate him being just as big as Lynch (the 3 yr old). I just have it as small as it goes and even though it’s a little loose it does not slide off his head. Love the width and the colors that are offered. Needless to say when I get my other pup next year I will definitely purchase another collar!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Howell

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best
customer_reviews.text: This was my second purchase of this collar. And the only reason I needed a new one was because my phone number changed, so I needed to update my boy's collar. The first one was purchased in November of last year, so almost a year ago, and it was still in amazing condition! Both times I ordered the collars, they came very quickly and the first time, they even included dog treats with it! When my number changed and I needed a new collar, I had to get another one of these. I changed up the colors and I was still extremely satisfied. Keep up the great work, guys!
customer_reviews.author: Katee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, but oversized for small dogs
customer_reviews.text: I really like this dog collar. It's good quality and the colors look fantastic. However, my dog is a 13 pound pug, so she's pretty tiny. I ordered a small, and was surprised that the collar and clip were so big for her. I'm going to keep it, because I love that I don't have to hang a tag from it (Leslie's fur rubs off from tags that swing against her neck), but I do wish this seller had an option for smaller dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed and nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these collars for our dogs. The printing appears to be silk-screened onto the fabric, but holds up against playful dogs, dirt, and sun very well. Name and phone number are very prominent. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Rogneby

customer_reviews.title: Happy puppy.
customer_reviews.text: I got the medium narrow size for my little puppy. I am happy with it, however it is a bit big after making it tighter. My puppy is 3 months old and growing so I think it will work out in the end. Thank you and thanks for the try me treats. My other dog loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Customer

customer_reviews.title: The wrong color collar was sent
customer_reviews.text: I like the collars, the quality is good. I have ordered over a dozen in the past couple of years. My most recent order, I received a collar that was NOT the color that I ordered. I have tried to get the mistake taken care of and the correct color collar sent to me, but have had NO success. The paperwork that came with the collars reflects the color combination that I ordered, but they reversed the colors and I don't care for the bright green collar and have no plans to use it. I am looking for another company to order from since I'm not having any luck getting to collar that I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Setter Fan

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS
customer_reviews.text: This was a great collar to purchase for my fur baby who is visually impaired and deaf! So if anyone see's her or she gets out they can look at her collar and know about her! Love this collar!
customer_reviews.author: Kenzie

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Love the personalized collar! Our dog kept taking his old one off and broke the clasp. He hasn't gotten this collar off and won't be able to break the nice metal clasp. Plus he looks so pretty in it.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy of 2

customer_reviews.title: Great Personalized Collar!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend and I just adopted a puppy and wanted to get a personalized collar. We LOVE it! It’s exactly what we customized and can’t wait to put it on our puppy. We ordered a small because she is 2 months old and we figured we’d be able to switch directly to a large when she grows out of the small. We are definitely going to get one of these again as long as it doesn’t wear down too quick or break. I will update my review if anything bad happens when we start using it!
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Ordered for a very small dog
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for a very small dog and was still a tad loose but dog is very small. Didn't received first shipment so they shipped again for free and I received the 2nd shipment. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nighthunter

customer_reviews.title: Awesome collar
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this collar ! I ordered a different collar from amazon but I had to adjust the collar so it can fit my dog well since the other collar was written one place this obstructed the view of my information the collar was pointless. This collar has my information written all the way around his collar multiple times. It’s clear and visible I also love that I can put that he is chipped. I went with blue collar white writing.
customer_reviews.author: _alessandra

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality and Fast Fedex Shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Collar is of excellent quality. Metal buckles and leash attachment ring, not plastic. Very clear, easy to read print for the personalized message. Easy to adjust size. Arrived super fast via Fedex. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Betsy Bargain

customer_reviews.title: Best Dog Collar EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! 1st collar our dog has left alone! Normally our dog will rip off her tags and then eat the collar. We have literally gone through 5 collars in 3 months everything from the cheap cheap to a fancy Kong and she ripped them all off! She’s also an escape artist so it’s also come in handy for people to call when she gets out. Best collar!! I will probably buy another one just as a back up since this one has outlasted just about everything else!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Deasy

customer_reviews.title: Classy Collar!
customer_reviews.text: Love this collar. It did come with a metal clasp and is Exactly as advertised! Text was perfect and exactly as I ordered. Appears to be a quality, USA made product! Yay! I highly recommend! Will be purchasing more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Animal House

customer_reviews.title: Decent collar
customer_reviews.text: Nice metal hardware. The colors are nice and lettering looks good. So what I don't like and would like to see improved is... The lettering and design embroidered. Increase thickness of material... As it is thin.
customer_reviews.author: Sheber

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have a 100 lb Rottweiler that loves to take me on walks by pulling me through the park so I needed something that was strong and not going to come apart. When this collar arrived, I absolutely loved the way it looked but it was time for the strength test. I hooked it together and pulled on both ends as hard as I could and it passed the test. Of course he is much stronger so the real test was putting it on him and taking him outside. It held together and I couldn't be happier with it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Everything looks great. The name and number printed out looks very nice. The collar looks pretty well made and I expect that it should last for several years. Got a large and it fits her good, we had to take it up a lot even though she has a fat neck, but fits nice. If I need another in the future, I’d definitely buy from here again. Shipping was quick, very very quick. 5 stars all around.
customer_reviews.author: AshLeigh Miller

customer_reviews.title: Love this collar
customer_reviews.text: Love this collar so much!!! It is made very well, the letters and numbers are crisp and legible. The buckle is made of metal. It is very good quality and we are so happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Catone

customer_reviews.title: Customer service won't answer
customer_reviews.text: The color is nice and I love the features. But the metal clasp that hooks it together digs into my dogs neck since it is heavy. It sits at the area non- stop. When we pull on her collar to hold her back from the door etc. It has started to leave marks in my dog's throat area. I have sent a message to the seller with no response. I will be returning to buy her a safer collar. And no it is not too tight.
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: REPEAT CUSTOMER
customer_reviews.text: My two dogs play hard and after about a year their collars were looking dirty (not worn out by any means, just dirty). SO...lazy thing that I am I didn't wash the ones they have - I ordered two more in different colors! I love these collars. Easy adjustment that STAYS PUT, solid clasps, print is bright and easily read. they are soft and flexible so they don't chafe my dogs necks. I ordered the 1 inch medium for both (and both of mine are about 75 - 80 lbs). Very pleased customer.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Gergen

customer_reviews.title: It is well made!!!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs are always losing their tags. This is the perfect solution. The collars are sharp looking, well made, and comfortable for the dogs. We have purchased 2 collars, and are ordering another for our 3rd dog. Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Wrede

customer_reviews.title: Faded
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this collar for our Frenchie mid September, here it is mid December and it looks old already. He is not an outdoor dog. The collar has faded, it is hard to see in the picture but very obvious in person and frayed on the edges. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: DF

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: We got tired of the tags hitting one another so I searched for a collar I could have embroidered. Well first of all, this is a company in the US so I automatically became more interested in their product line. I customized the collar online and couldn't believe how quickly it was shipped out. Great quality! Will definitely order from them again when the need arises.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Love it so much!
customer_reviews.text: Love it so much! The metal buckle is good for bigger dogs like mine. I have a German Shepherd and she was going through collars so fast because she pulls when we walk her and she breaks the plastic and thin material of normal collars, but this collar is extremely high quality and beautiful and I love how much you can customize it! I will for sure be getting more in the future for other dogs I own!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley G

customer_reviews.title: Great collar!
customer_reviews.text: Lizzie hates tags hanging from her collar, and this solves the issue. I've ordered 2 different collars now for her, and will order more. I have just thrown it in with the laundry when its been dirty; in 3 months I have washed it in cold water twice and laid flat to dry. Looks fine after the wash! Takes care of me worrying about her getting out with no tag.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer bodoh

customer_reviews.title: This is a really nice dog collar
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice dog collar. The letters are not embroidered so they should last longer than the last collar which had embroidered letters. The collar fit the dog nicely and is comfortable. It is easy to adjust and the buckles are great quality. He has been swimming with it a number of times and it has been color fast.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L. Crowley

customer_reviews.title: Great product and Great company!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This company is terrific!! The first collar I ordered for my dog was to big, so I contacted them and they made a new one in a smaller size at no charge. The collar is really great everyone is loving it, also it is a well made product. You can't go wrong with this company!!!
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Quickly filled order.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very quickly !Looks great! Measure your dogs neck first~ if I had one complaint it would be the collar is too large for my large 100 lb dog. But it was my fault for not measuring! The wording goes all the way around the collar. Very large lettering. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Leeandjp

customer_reviews.title: Love these for my dogs!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these collars for my dogs since it seemed like they were always getting their name tags caught on something then losing them. I am very happy with the quality ! The part where it clicks together is holding up nicely. I have a 81 lb redbone coonhound and a 7 month old shepherd/ lab mix puppy that weighs 72 lbs and with their pulling at times, the collar has yet to come apart like plastic clasps on other collars we've had. I also love how their name and our phone number repeats all the way around the collar so now matter how tight or lose it needs to be, the information is always visible.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and durable - Strong fastener and very durable
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic quality! We've ordered other personalized collars - but hey, we have a BIG DOG - and she snaps those cheap plastic fasteners too easily. This has been durable and comfortable for our Goldendoodle girl. And she looks ah-mazing in this collar.
customer_reviews.author: The Spirited Scribe

customer_reviews.title: Very Best Dog Collar
customer_reviews.text: I chose the orange color collar with black writing My dogs name and my phone number. The collar fits well on my 16 pound dog in size small. My dog is full grown but this collar has room for a growing dog if needed.
customer_reviews.author: DDM

customer_reviews.title: Made in the USA!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome customer service! My first collar had a faulty clasp, and seller quickly sent a replacement. Will recomendó this company to friends! A+
customer_reviews.author: Patrici Murici

customer_reviews.title: Love it !
customer_reviews.text: We have 3 dogs and we decided to buy one for the smallest as she is always losing her tag and we love her collar! We are considering buying some for the 2 bigger ones but we might spread it out as they are a little pricy when you're buying for 3. Thank you for her beautiful collar and I pray it lasts a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Lynn Evaro

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: It was nice to be able to have this personalized. But this seems to be a poor quality item. It has broken in only 3 months. Also it was NOT being continuously used I swap between 2 other collar.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding customer support & product
customer_reviews.text: Hello I have 5 fur babies and would never think to buy a collar from any but Hog Dog Collars! The products are exceptional. The clasp is sturdy, the writing doesn't fade and they clean up well wash after wash. The owners are focused on providing an outstanding experience. They proactively reach out to me after each order to drive loyalty with their base. Again, buy from Yellow Dog and you won't be disappointed! Joy - Austin, TX
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this collar. It turned out much better than I expected. I chose the purple collar with teal writing. I decide to get this collar since my dogs ID tag would get stuck under her food bowl and it would deter her from wanting to eat but she gets upset without her collar being on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Personalized Premium Dog Collar with Metal Clasp - Available 20 Colors + Multiple Sizes
product_meta.description: Pattern Name:Stacked Text PersonalizationThis premium ID Dog Collar is the perfect replacement for your pets ID tags. No more "tag jingle", not more lost tags, and no more worrying what will happen if your dog gets loose. Made in the USA with patented metal buckles, this is a top of the line dog collar that is backed by the Yellow Dog Design.
feature_bullets: PERSONALIZED PREMIUM DOG COLLAR - Add any text you want, some ideas include your dogs name, your phone #, an address, 2 phone #s, or be creative on this ID Dog Collar. Maximum of 24 characters. PLUS, add an artistic icon for some personality

MADE IN THE USA - This name dog collar is manufactured from start to finish by Yellow Dog Design Inc in Greensboro NC. They make it and we'll handle all of the shipping and service. We appreciate your support of US based businesses

HI-DEF DESIGN - This dog collar is completely computer generated and integrated with the fabric. It WILL NOT come off. It's not a sticker, decal, or other superficial application. This production process creates a crystal clear finished product that will POP on the collar

PREMIUM DOG COLLAR - This premium custom dog collar features all weather nickel plated hardware. Including a patented metal clasp, sturdy d-ring for leash attachment, and metal keeper to prevent resizing while on the dog. As with all metal please use caution in corrosive environments such as salt water

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
